description: First Russian-language benchmark combining real GitHub data and LLM-generated synthetic docstrings (Python/Java/C#/Go/JS) for evaluating structured code documentation models.

function.ru: Функция, к которой нужно сгенерировать структурированный комментарий
function.en: The function to generate a structured comment for.

prompts:
Add documentation comments to this function in English using the appropriate format for its language (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc.). 
{function}

Write a structured documentation comment for this function in English, it should adhere to documentation standards of its language (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc.).
{function}

Generate comprehensive English documentation for this function following language-specific conventions (XML docs for C#, GoDoc for Golang, etc.). Function:
{function}

Create professional documentation in docstring format for this function in English, using the appropriate format for its language (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc.).
{function}

Your task is to write a complete English documentation comments (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc., depending on language) to this function.
{function}

Document this function in English according to its language standards (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc., depending on language). 
{function}

Please provide a structured English documentation comment (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc., depending on language). 
{function}

Generate a documentation block for this function, according to its language standards (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc., depending on language)
{function}

Write multi-line English documentation for this function, according to its language standards (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc., depending on language)
{function}

Produce complete English documentation adhering to the appropriate format for its language (Docstring, GoDoc, JavaDoc, JSDoc, XML docs, etc.).
{function}

chrf.ru: Метрика, оценивающая совпадение символьных n-грамм с эталонным текстом и подходящая для морфологии и орфографии русского языка
chrf.en: Metric evaluating character n-gram matches with reference text, suitable for Russian morphology and spelling accuracy
